resources.string: Please, fill out all the hours
By clicking here you accept the terms and conditions and privacy policy of the application
You need to agree to the privacy policy and terms and conditions in order to continue using this application
Do you know how crucial it can be washing your hands so you can avoid some diseases? With this app, you will never forget it 😉
Customize your experience with an schedule about when you usually do certain actions so you can be notified when you should wash your hands
If you allow access to user activity, you will receive notifications when, for example, you get off from a vehicle 🚇 or after running ü§º‚Äç🏃‍Ô∏è. You can disable this option at any moment
Privacy policy and terms of service

{gmd_info_outline} Despite of the configuration above, some data will still be shared. This data contains information about possible application crashes or errors. It is always anonymous and will help updating the app, including new features and solving errors.
